overview.summary: Allow to list, add, delete, and modify users.

property.name: UsersDbPath
property.summary: The path to the security database on the server; for example, /usr/interbase/.

constructor.name: ctor
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of class.

method.name: AddUser(UserData)
method.summary: Add a user to the isc4.gdb security database.

method.name: DeleteUser(UserData)
method.summary: Remove a user from the isc4.gdb security database.

method.name: ModifyUser(UserData)
method.summary: Modify user information in the isc4.gdb security database.
method.remarks: You cannot change the UserName property, only the properties associated with that user name.

method.name: DisplayUsers
method.summary: Display information for a single user or all users in the isc4.gdb security database, respectively.
